channel.title: Gauntlet Comics: Fellowship - Eyes of the Underlord
channel.description:
![Eyes%20of%20the%20Underlord%20Campaign%20Header|625x500](upload://oCmOvpxaDB9XFKKUGEKWZSXXA6G.jpeg) A terrible force is growing strong in the fantastic subterranean realm of Kam'Dir...and even the mighty Sorcerer Kings fear its approach. The various peoples of Kam'Dir all must band together against it or fall to its power separately and alone. But even the greatest among the great ask in whispers if it might already be too late.
We will be playing Fellowship 2nd Edition, from Liberi Gothica Games, and using [roll20.net](https://roll20.net/) to keep track of characters, moves, and other information. [Zoom](https://zoom.us/) will be used for video conferencing.
All standard Gauntlet Hangouts[ Tools of the Table](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/tools-of-the-table.html) will be in use, including the Open Table Policy and the X-Card, to help us set up a fun and safe table for everyone. Our story will take place in the[ Gauntlet Comics](https://gauntletcomics.miraheze.org/wiki/Main_Page) shared universe, a creation of the Gauntlet Community’s own Rich Rogers, Lowell Francis, and Jim Crocker.
This event is scheduled to run for 2 1/2 to 3 hours. It will be recorded if all parties agree.
There will be 5 sessions in total. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
[date=2020-03-02 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-03-02 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 1 of 5](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LyWE9q88b7kG66W-QX7)
[date=2020-03-09 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-03-09 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 2 of 5](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LyWEMJyC8AO-fxt6EsM)
[date=2020-03-16 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-03-16 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 3 of 5](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LyWEVIhKx5lCcIkZ-g2)
[date=2020-03-23 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-03-23 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 4 of 5](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LyWF5SgH67StJgrC4fX)
[date=2020-03-30 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-03-30 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 5 of 5](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LyWFEs68zH6TUUr31t-)

item.title: Gauntlet Comics: Fellowship - Eyes of the Underlord
item.dc:creator: @inarvan
item.description:
@inarvan wrote:

Eyes%20of%20the%20Underlord%20Campaign%20Header3000×2400 565 KB

A terrible force is growing strong in the fantastic subterranean realm of Kam’Dir…and even the mighty Sorcerer Kings fear its approach. The various peoples of Kam’Dir all must band together against it or fall to its power separately and alone. But even the greatest among the great ask in whispers if it might already be too late.

We will be playing Fellowship 2nd Edition, from Liberi Gothica Games, and using roll20.net to keep track of characters, moves, and other information. Zoom will be used for video conferencing.

All standard Gauntlet Hangouts Tools of the Table will be in use, including the Open Table Policy and the X-Card, to help us set up a fun and safe table for everyone. Our story will take place in the Gauntlet Comics shared universe, a creation of the Gauntlet Community’s own Rich Rogers, Lowell Francis, and Jim Crocker.

This event is scheduled to run for 2 1/2 to 3 hours. It will be recorded if all parties agree.

There will be 5 sessions in total. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
